ComicInfo.Summary: Ian kills Setsuke on orders from Irons. With the Witchblade freaking out on her, Sara barely makes it home without being discovered by her fellow police officers. Jake discovers that Gavin Taylor is importing illegal aliens as prostitutes for his sick sex games. Sara finds a box of mementos of her father left by Joe Siry on her doorstep and goes wild when Siry confesses that he killed her dad to protect her from Irons. Eric confronts a mob boss about the death of his daughter but Pironi doesn't really seem to care.
